Text:
can anyone tell me what's the sound quality like?
last rip of this movie had a really bad sound...

cool, i'll download it now :D
thanx
the last HD rip _was_ from BluRay, but had custom line audio due to it being RC (Region C) sourced, i.e. non-english audio.

v: 10
a:8

Took a while, but worth it.
Thanks man

V - 8
A - 7

Still searching for the subs, but have seen the first 5mins of the movie. I'm afraid the movie is going to be a bit dissapointing ;)
bad rip.  Tons of pixelations when I watched from my TV so be careful.  Worked fine on the PC though

Thank you for the upload, the audio and video quality are excellent.  If anyone gets pixelation it's either your cpu or media player.

This was simply the worst film I have ever seen, though.
This is the 1st blu-ray that I've been unable to play no matter what I've tried. Bummer...took all night 2 DL but thanks anyway.
